thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 2 of 26
thread.title: ANN

author: ANN
title: ANN
text:
I could not figure out how to repair my old Gaggia machine and started shopping online for a replacement. The WLL website helped a lot. I was able to compare different machines in great detail. It was very very useful. What I needed was what changes as the price increases and what benefits are gained and how to make the best espresso and that information was a little more difficult to pull out of all the data. I went to youtube and found even more great information. Lots of the videos were WLL videos, very useful. So if you look and look, there is lots of good information available.
When I finally called WLL, I did not get much info or help making my decision. But there is so much online that one should probably use that as the source of info on the buying decision.
